ygData.subject: Re: GAVERON's CUTLASS!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Have not seen anything with specs ever remotely close to that for 1H slash. http://gameznet.com/eq has the largest list of special items I have seen, and I
ygData.messageBody:
Have not seen anything with specs ever remotely close to that for 1H slash.
http://gameznet.com/eq has the largest list of special items I have seen,
and I haven't seen it there.

Trent Carroll
Programmer
Houston Baptist University
(281) 649-3410

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kevin Koen [mailto:big_k69@...]
> Sent: Thursday, July 01, 1999 3:48 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: [warriors_eq] GAVERON's CUTLASS!!!!!
>
>
> From: Kevin Koen <big_k69@...>
>
> Greetings and Well Met,
>
>
> Hello all warriors, My name is Genadarilo of Povar
> i am a lvl 30 warrior.
>
> I am looking for the location or to even find out if this sword is
> even in the game now..
>
> The sword is called Gaveron's Cutlass it is a 1h slashing weapon
> the stats are...
>
>
> Damage: 16 Delay: 24 Range: Weight: 8.5
>
> has the effect of Quickness (casts randomly and lasts ~3-5
> minutes.) Looks
> like a Scimitar when equiped.
>
> Compatible Classes:
> Warrior
>
> Compatible Races:
> Dwarf Gnome High Elf Troll Ogre Human Wood Elf
> Dark Elf
> Erudite Halfling Barbarian Half Elf
>
> if anyone can help me find this weapon it would be greatly appreciated.
>
> Also, if any of u feel like replying to this with some smart
> remark about me
> being crazy or insane or stupid to think that anyone would give out this
> info, please keep them to yourself...
>
>
> Thank u all
> Genadarilo of Povar
> warrior of the 30th tier
> The Hawk Empire
>
